definitions.definition: The quality of being genuine or not corrupted from the original, of having the same origin (or attribution, commitment, intention, etc.) as claimed.
examples: I hereby certify the authenticity of this copy.
The authenticity of this painting is questionable.

definitions.definition: The quality of being authentic (of established authority ).

main_definition: The quality of being genuine or not corrupted from the original, of having the same origin (or attribution, commitment, intention, etc.) as claimed.
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) The quality of being authentic (of established authority ).
